title: Missionary Work
cleaned_text: - go forth and none shall stay them, [D&C 1:5](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/1.5?lang=eng#p5). - gospel might be proclaimed by the weak and the simple, [D&C 1:23](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/1.23?lang=eng#p23). - marvelous work is about to come forth, [D&C 4:1](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/4.1?lang=eng#p1). - declare my word, but first seek to obtain my word, [D&C 11:21](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/11.21?lang=eng#p21). - most worth unto you will be to declare repentance, [D&C 15:6](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/15.6?lang=eng#p6). - bring, save it be one soul unto me, how great shall be your joy, [D&C 18:15](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/18.15?lang=eng#p15). - mine elect hear my voice and harden not their hearts, [D&C 29:7](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/29.7?lang=eng#p7). - Open your mouths and they shall be [D&C 33:8](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/33.8?lang=eng#p8) ( [Moses 6:32](/study/scriptures/pgp/moses/6.32?lang=eng#p32)). - none ... doeth good except those who are ready to receive the fulness of my gospel, [D&C 35:12](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/35.12?lang=eng#p12). - ordained and sent forth to preach, [D&C 36:5](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/36.5?lang=eng#p5). - from thence men shall go forth into all nations, [D&C 39:15](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/39.15?lang=eng#p15). - go forth ... preaching my gospel, two by two, [D&C 42:6](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/42.6?lang=eng#p6). - not ... preach my gospel ... except he be ordained, [D&C 42:11](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/42.11?lang=eng#p11). - teach the children of men, [D&C 43:15](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/43.15?lang=eng#p15). - go among this people, and say unto them, [D&C 49:11](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/49.11?lang=eng#p11). - sent forth to preach the word of truth, [D&C 50:17](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/50.17?lang=eng#p17). - journey together, or two by two, [D&C 61:35](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/61.35?lang=eng#p35). - declare glad tidings unto the inhabitants, [D&C 62:5](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/62.5?lang=eng#p5). - those who desire in their hearts ... to warn sinners, [D&C 63:57](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/63.57?lang=eng#p57). - open your mouths in proclaiming my gospel, [D&C 71:1](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/71.1?lang=eng#p1). - proclaiming the truth according to the revelations, [D&C 75:4](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/75.4?lang=eng#p4). - bearing testimony to all the world, [D&C 84:61](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/84.61?lang=eng#p61). - send you out to reprove the world, [D&C 84:87](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/84.87?lang=eng#p87). - every man who hath been warned to warn his neighbor, [D&C 88:81](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/88.81?lang=eng#p81). - every man shall hear ... the gospel in his own tongue, [D&C 90:11](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/90.11?lang=eng#p11). - it shall be given you ... what ye shall say, [D&C 100:6](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/100.6?lang=eng#p6). - Seventy are also called to preach, [D&C 107:25](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/107.25?lang=eng#p25). - kept from the truth because they know not where to find it, [D&C 123:12](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/123.12?lang=eng#p12). - Send ... elders of my church unto the nations, [D&C 133:8](/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/133.8?lang=eng#p8). - servants of God
